info.title: Healthcare Professional ID Service
info.description: It is important to standardize the process of identification of an individual across Healthcare providers, to ensure that the created medical records are issued to the right individual or accessed by a Health Information User through appropriate consent. In order to issue a Healthcare Professional ID to an individual, one only needs basic demographic details like **Name, Year of Birth, Gender**. In addition, citizens should be able to update contact information easily. The Healthcare Professional ID will be used for the purposes of uniquely identifying persons, authenticating them, and threading their health records (only with the informed consent of the patient) across multiple systems and stakeholders. ## API Security You need Authorization Token and X-HIP-ID to consume APIs. ## Notes: 1. In order to have access to Healthcare Professional ID APIs, Your `ClientId`* required must have hid role in gateway. So if you want access to these APIs then please request it in your Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM) on-boarding request. 2. When calling APIs, please ensure that Authorization header must have format as `Bearer `. Please note that prefix Bearer followed by space before token value. 3. Please use latest version of **APIs (currently latest V2)** as older version may get deprecated soon. 4. Check the state and district codes from LGD directory [click here](https://lgdirectory.gov.in/) 5. Highlighted Changes in the API Version 2 - Sensitive data (Data like OTP, Aadhaar Number/Virtual ID/UID Token, Password, Username etc) have to be encrypted. - Data is encrypted by the public certificate. The certificate can be downloaded from the __/v1/auth/cert__ API under __Authentication__ tag in the version 1. - RSA Encryption to encrypt the data. Cipher Type - RSA/ECB/PKCS1Padding. online tool to encrypt data [click here](https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/rsa-encryption-decryption)

post.summary: Search a user by Healthcare Professional ID Number.
post.description:
## Search a user by Healthcare Professional ID Number.
- Healthcare Professional ID and Year Of Birth need to pass in the request
## Request below is the Request Parameters description 
| Attributes | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| hprId <sup style='color:red'>* required</sup> | Healthcare Professional ID Number/Healthcare Professional ID |
| yearOfBirth <sup style='color:red'>* required</sup> | year of birth example: 1990|

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

200.description: API will return the details of the accounts

500.description: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.summary: Generate Aadhaar OTP on registered mobile number
post.description:
Generate Aadhaar OTP on registered mobile number- Beneficiary data need to create HP ID in the request
- KYC data will  be verified by UIDIA, Before creating the Healthcare Professional ID
## Request
Below is the Request Parameters description 
| Attributes | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| aadhaar <sup style='color:red'>* required</sup>|Encrypted AadhaarNumber(12-digits) or Virtual ID(16-Digits) or UidToken(72-Digits). (Must be Encrypted with public key)|
| iagree | User consent to access the Aadhaar Demograhic Data|
| consentVersion  | Consent Version Default : V1|

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

500.description: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.description:
Notes

1: Verification OTP received over the email address. OTP* required and transaction id* required should be passed in the request.

2: OTP must be in the encrypted.

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

post.summary: To generate the Email Verification OTP to verify the Email Address in the Registration. OTP will be sent to the provided email address.
post.description:
Notes

1: To verify the Email Address provided by the beneficiary during the registration process, OTP will be sent to the email address. Send the Email Address in the request.

2: Email Verification OTP will be valid for 10 minutes only.

3: To Update or Changes the existing e-mail Address (Verified/Unverified email). Send the New Email Address* required in the request.

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

200.description: API will return the transaction for the futher step.

500.description: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.summary: Create Healthcare Professional ID by Aadhaar Demographic data
post.description: ## Create the Healthcare Professional ID using Aadhaar Demographic Data (Aadhaar/Name/Gender/DOB) details . - Beneficiary data need to create HP ID in the request - Demographic data will be verified by UIDIA, Before creating the Healthcare Professional ID ## Request Below is the Request Parameters description | Attributes | Description | | ------ | ------ | | aadhaar * required|Encrypted AadhaarNumber(12-digits) or Virtual ID(16-Digits) or UidToken(72-Digits). (Must be Encrypted with public key)| | fullName * required | Full Name of the Beneficiary mentioned in the documents (Either provide full name or FirstName, MiddleName, Lastname)| | firstName * required | First Name of the Beneficiary mentioned in the documents | | middleName | Middle Name of the Beneficiary mentioned in the documents | | lastName | Last Name of the Beneficiary mentioned in the documents | | gender * required | Male - M, Female - F, Other - O, I do not want to disclose - U | | dayOfBirth | date of birth | | monthOfBirth | month of birth | | yearOfBirth * required | year of birth | | address | Address of the beneficiary| | hprId | HprID refers to the Healthcare Address created by the user.| | password | Authentication Passwords user want to set| | mobileNumber * required| Contact Details of the Beneficiary| | email * required | Email Address | | profilePhoto | Photo in base-64 format. Photo formats like PNG, JPG, JPEG and JPEG | | stateCode * required | LGD state code of the state | | districtCode * required | LGD district code of the district | | pincode * required | Valid 6-digits pincode | | hpCategoryCode * required | Valid HP Category Code. More info refer to '/v1/utility/getHpIdCategories' )| | hpSubCategoryCode * required | Valid Sub Category Code. More info refer to '/v1/utility/getHpIdSubCategories' )| | iagree | User consent to access the Aadhaar Demograhic Data| | consentVersion | Consent Version Default : V1|

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

500.description: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.summary: Send the Email Verification Activation Link to verify the E-mail Address.
post.description:
Notes

1: To verify the Email Address provided by the beneficiary, Send the Email Address in the request.

2: Activation link will be expire in 30 Minutes.

3: To regenerate the Activation link when the previous link is expired. Send the X-Token * required in the Header.

4: To Generate the activation link user must be authorized.

post.summary: Generate Aadhaar OTP on registered mobile number
post.description:
Generate Aadhaar OTP on registered mobile number- KYC data will  be verified by UIDIA## Request
Below is the Request Parameters description 
| Attributes | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| aadhaar <sup style='color:red'>* required</sup>|Encrypted AadhaarNumber(12-digits) or Virtual ID(16-Digits) or UidToken(72-Digits). (Must be Encrypted with public key)|
| iagree | User consent to access the Aadhaar Demograhic Data|
| consentVersion  | Consent Version Default : V1|

400.description: Bad Request. Please provide valid request syntax

500.description: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

items.description: Profile photo of the user (Uploaded by the user).

fullName.description: Full Name of the user.(Either provide full name or FirstName, MiddleName, Lastname)

yearOfBirth.description: Year of birth of the user.

password.description: Passwords for authentication (Must be Encrypted with public key).
